flow.name: timelineDetailBPFlow

db:select.db:parameterized-query: SELECT t.id,t.community_id as communityID,c.name as communityName,t.description,t.file, t.created_date, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM felo.comments WHERE timeline_id=#[originalPayload['timelineID']]) as comments, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM felo.likes WHERE timeline_id=#[originalPayload['timelineID']]) as likes, (SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1/0 FROM felo.likes WHERE member_id=(SELECT id FROM felo.members WHERE msisdn=#[originalPayload['msisdn']] AND timeline_id=#[originalPayload['timelineID']]))) as isLike, (SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1/0 FROM felo.comments WHERE member_id=(SELECT id FROM felo.members WHERE msisdn=#[originalPayload['msisdn']] AND timeline_id=#[originalPayload['timelineID']]))) as isComment, (SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1/0 FROM felo.timelines WHERE member_id=(SELECT id FROM felo.members WHERE msisdn=#[originalPayload['msisdn']] AND id=#[originalPayload['timelineID']]))) as isMe, (SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1/0 FROM felo.member_community WHERE member_id=(SELECT id FROM felo.members WHERE msisdn=#[originalPayload['msisdn']]) AND community_id=#[originalPayload['communityID']] AND admin='1')) as isAdmin, (SELECT name FROM felo.members WHERE id=(SELECT member_id from felo.timelines WHERE id=#[originalPayload['timelineID']])) as shareName, (SELECT profile_picture FROM felo.members WHERE id=(SELECT member_id from felo.timelines WHERE id=#[originalPayload['timelineID']])) as profPicShare FROM timelines t INNER JOIN communities c ON t.community_id=c.id INNER JOIN felo.members m ON t.member_id=m.id WHERE t.id=#[originalPayload['timelineID']]
